abstract_summ: The outbreak of novel coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19) imposed a substantial health burden in mainland China and remains a global epidemic threat . Of 12,863 cases reported outside Hubei, we obtained individual records for 9,651 cases, including 62 deaths and 1,449 discharged cases . Older age (OR 1.18 per year) and being treated in less developed economic regions (e.g., West and Northeast vs. East) were mortality risk factors . The estimated CFR was 0.89-1.24% among all cases .
